testcase.name: Standalone WebView Tests › Basic Functionality › should load the WebView page successfully
Standalone WebView Tests › Basic Functionality › should display initial terminal tab
Standalone WebView Tests › Basic Functionality › should hide loading indicator after initialization
Standalone WebView Tests › Terminal Tab Management › should create new terminal when clicking + button
Standalone WebView Tests › Terminal Tab Management › should switch active terminal when clicking tab
Standalone WebView Tests › Terminal Tab Management › should close terminal when clicking close button
Standalone WebView Tests › Terminal Tab Management › should not exceed maximum of 5 terminals
Standalone WebView Tests › Action Buttons › should have all action buttons visible
Standalone WebView Tests › Action Buttons › should have proper ARIA labels on action buttons
Standalone WebView Tests › AI Agent Status › should show agent status when agent is detected
Standalone WebView Tests › AI Agent Status › should apply correct styling for different agents
Standalone WebView Tests › AI Agent Status › should hide agent status when agent disconnects
Standalone WebView Tests › Debug Panel › should toggle debug panel with Ctrl+Shift+D
Standalone WebView Tests › Debug Panel › should display terminal state in debug panel
Standalone WebView Tests › Accessibility › should have proper ARIA roles
Standalone WebView Tests › Accessibility › should have proper aria-selected on tabs
Standalone WebView Tests › Notifications › should display notification and auto-dismiss
Standalone WebView Tests › Notifications › should show info notification on terminal ready
Standalone WebView Tests › Keyboard Navigation › should allow tab navigation through action buttons
